posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Is this for a custom server? If so, please furnish the details which would impact a build like low-magic vs. high-magic. I assume it must be custom if it is capped at level 30.

Also, please limit your request further.

Factors such as dual-wielding, weapon choice, STR vs. DEX (or vs. WIS for monk MC)... these all will have bearing whether a build will satisfy. Multiclass preference? Race preference? Stealth or other skills? The more details the better. Those all-purpose builds that try to satisfy every aspect of game play will always be inferior on the battlefield.

posts.author: avado
posts.content:
For the record, it can ONLY happen with a Dex-cleric, and because the cleric doesnt get anything inherant from Dex, means you will suck ass, generally. You need to get a few levels of a dex class (rogue is easiest). On a lv 30 cap server, I would try to get 24 cleric, 19 wisdom. Maybe do a halfling slingshot build! LOL nah.

You will not get what you want in 30 lvls. You have to remember that there is a +20 cap to AC and AB. i should qualify that: you will not get MY definition of VERY HIGH ab and AC in 30 lvls! Maybe yours is different.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Actually, this topic is not a build but a request and should be posted there for best results. Folks search this subforum to find builds rather than to describe what they are searching for.

You need to get a few levels of a dex class (rogue is easiest). On a lv 30 cap server, I would try to get 24 cleric, 19 wisdom. Maybe do a halfling slingshot build! LOL nah.
Slingshot. Ooookeee! *lol* Problem with rogue is low discipline so needs to try to get AC so high as to avoid any hits along with evasion, UD, etc. I think a robed monk MC would be stronger and saves better. The weapon choice is prohibitive though, so that may be too limiting depending on what the OP had in mind. IIRC there are already a few Level 30 monk/cleric builds posted.
You will not get what you want in 30 lvls. You have to remember that there is a +20 cap to AC and AB. i should qualify that: you will not get MY definition of VERY HIGH ab and AC in 30 lvls! Maybe yours is different.
Though the OP has not detailed the request much I suspect it is another Arelith request which has those 3-sequential-level multiclass constraints making it even more unlikely that any build would approach qualifying for the avado award of good buildkeeping.

----> Please, OP, post this request in the appropriate subforum with enough specifics so that those who seek to help you will have enough ammunition to do some good. Also, keep in mind that PvP and PvM are two vastly different builds when you repost. Tx!
